properties.areaDesc: Randall; Potter; Deaf Smith; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 29 at 3:01AM CST until February 29 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag
Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in
effect from 10 AM this morning to 8 PM CST this evening.

* Affected Area...In Texas...Oldham...Potter...Deaf Smith...
Randall and Palo Duro Canyon.

* 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 20 foot winds increasing to 15 to 25
mph with gusts near 30 to 35 mph by late this morning. Winds are
expected to become west after midnight tonight into Sunday
morning 5 to 15 mph.

* Relative Humidity...As low as 6 to 11 percent.

* Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 5.

* Timing...Critical fire weather conditions are expected to begin
around 10 AM to 12 PM and then are expected to end around 7 PM
to 9 PM this evening.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will
create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid
activities that promote open flames and sparks.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE
